fret.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to worry about something, especially when there is no need
fret.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Don’t fret – everything will be all right.
She’s always fretting about the children.
men of fifty, fretting that they’re no longer young
fret.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: one of the raised lines on the fretboard of a guitar etc
